text_block_list.text: (… That day, during practice with Ardan-san, it felt like she was using her lead to restrain me… up against that, I—)
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: (… lost my balance on purpose.)
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: …I'm sorry, Ardan-san. I'll work hard so I can dance with you properly.
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: (But please, forgive me for that time. I was so scared. If you'd gone any further, I—)
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: (— I thought I'd lose that "special" I'd worked so hard for.)
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: You copying Maruzen's dance?
text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio

text_block_list.text: Eh-?
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: Hey hey, can I share this studio with you? It's OK, right? I just wanna work on the finishing touches of my routine!
text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio

text_block_list.text: Ah, okay!… Wait how'd you know?! That I was trying to copy Maruzen-san's dance, I mean…
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: That's 'cause I studied Prez's dance from head to toe, duh!
text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio

text_block_list.text: So I wanna shine super bright just like Prez did at the Dorowa! Like this!
text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio

text_block_list.text: (And so Teio-san began to dance, with every step looking just like—)
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: (Just… like…?)
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: W… what are you doing with the choreography?! Isn't that completely different from what Rudolf-san did?!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: Yup. It's so "Teio", no?
text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio

text_block_list.text: Huh?! Ah, I'm sorry! You said "like the president," so I thought you'd just do the exact same dance…
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: Huuuuh? 'Course not! I'm the "Monarch" who'll beat the "Emperor", y'know!
text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio

text_block_list.text: Plus, there's no point if I just do a carbon copy of Prez! If Prez herself competes in the Dorowa, a cheap copy won't win against her, now would it?
text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio

text_block_list.text: All a copy can do is take you to a draw. To win, I've gotta put on a show like nobody else!
text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio

text_block_list.text: You don't wanna win, Chiyono O? Even if Maruzen joined the Dorowa?
text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio

text_block_list.text: Mwehehe! I mean, you're aiming for Best Date too, aren't you?
text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio

text_block_list.text: …All a copy can do is take you to a draw.
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: But the "ordinary" old me can't help wanting to be "special", even if that means just copying someone else…
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: You don't wanna win, Chiyono O? Even if Maruzen joined the Dorowa?
text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio

text_block_list.text: …gh!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: (… There's a reason I couldn't synchronise with Chiyono O-san during our practice at the studio.)
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: (I know why. A dance takes two, but… on that day…)
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: Our eyes never met, not even once.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: (… I knew she was practicing on her own behind my back. She didn't want to burden me with worry. Even so—)
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: …Don't just look at "them."
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: Ah… uh, Ardan-san? Would you like a drink? They say a warm drink's the best when you're feelin' down and out, yeah?
text_block_list.name: Nice Nature

text_block_list.text: …Nature-san. Thank you for your concern.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: …You're not really practising together, is it? About that, Chiyono-san's been practising on her own for a while…
text_block_list.name: Nice Nature

text_block_list.text: So you've been worried for her as well. I'm sorry to have troubled you.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: If I may confess, the time we have to practise together is rather linited.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: It's the fault of my weak legs. Even just continuing to practise for too long leads to a temperature… despite that constraint, we've become eachother's date.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: I suppose some of the blame lies with me, too. For putting such a strain between us.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: …A strain, huh?
text_block_list.name: Nice Nature

text_block_list.text: Well… even so, I have no intention whatsoever to drag her down with me.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: Regardless of how this might worsen things between us, it's no time to pull out a wedge we've driven in. I've not given up yet… and, more importantly, neither has she.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: …What should I do?
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: Greetings, Sakura Chiyono O-san.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text: Do you have some spare time this afternoon? I have a matter I'd like to speak with you about.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
